Installing¶

Installing and using PyTravLITE seems simple enough. Just download the archive from GitHub and extract it to a folder you prefer.

Running PyTravLITE¶

If you have Python 3.11 installed, you can start PyTravLITE.py from a CMD prompt or double-click the Python script.

Alternatively, if you do not have Python 3.11, you can start PyTravLITE.exe (located in the dist folder) from a CMD prompt or by double-clicking the executable program.

Output to DOS has been depricated in this version.

New in version 0.1.0

Either way, the HTTP web server will start. Then open your web browser and enter http://localhost:8080/generate for its URL.

Bottle uses a simple and lightweight WSGI micro web-framework for its built-in HTTP server for Python.
